briefTitle: Stochastic Modulated Vibrations on Autonomic Nervous System of Breast Cancer Patients During Radiotherapy
officialTitle: The Influence of Stochastic Modulated Vibrations on the Autonomic Nervous System of Breast Cancer Patients During Radiotherapy: a Randomized Clinical Trial
conditions: Autonomic Nervous System Imbalance, Psychological Distress, Cancer-related Pain, Breast Cancer Lymphedema, Quality of Life
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Histological proven breast cancer, following breast cancer surgery
* Starting with adjuvant radiation therapy for 3 weeks
* Minimum 18 years
* Medical record available and complete
* Supine lying on mattress for 20 minutes is possible
* Dutch, French or English

Exclusion Criteria:

* Severe neurological, orthopaedic or rheumatic disorders
* Cardiac disorders
* Early or synchronous malignancy
* Pregnancy or lactation
* Persons suffering from depression or illnesses which influence the mental health or wellbeing
